definition: vocational high school (abbr. for 職業高中|职业高中[zhi2 ye4 gao1 zhong1])
office/duty
high/tall/above average/loud/your (honorific)

sentences.english: The ultimate aim of students, who study English in vocational school, is to communicate with others.
sentences.chinese: 职高学生学习英语的最终目的是与人交流。

sentences.english: Leads: I was a duty high graduate, the graduation nearly 6 years.
sentences.chinese: 我是一名职高毕业生，毕业快6年了。

sentences.english: The teacher and student of higher vocational college is unique.
sentences.chinese: 高职高专教师和学生独具特色。

sentences.english: Practical writing in higher vocational colleges is one of the public foundation courses.
sentences.chinese: 应用文写作是高职高专院校的公共基础课程之一。

sentences.english: Writing teaching is a difficult part in language teaching in vocational education and also the weakest one.
sentences.chinese: 写作教学是职高语文教学中的难点也是最薄弱的环节。

sentences.english: Quality Gao Zhuanzu who achieves the certain proportion to the newborn rate of personnel loss darns the record.
sentences.chinese: 对新生流失率达到一定比例的高职高专组织补录。

sentences.english: How can complete duty Gao Ban the teacher in charge to work?
sentences.chinese: 怎样才能做好职高班班主任工作？

sentences.english: What kind of college is a good match for a frail, introverted guy like myself?"
sentences.chinese: 身体瘦弱，性格内向的男孩，应报考什么职高专业？“

sentences.english: Higher vocational education orientates the crucial part that constitute educational system.
sentences.chinese: 高职高专教育是我国高等教育体系的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Opportunities and challenges coexist in the educational field of profession-oriented colleges.
sentences.chinese: 高职高专教育领域机遇与挑战并存。

sentences.english: Yang Zhenying answers fluently in English the judge's question at the Tianjin Practical English Speaking Contest for Professional College Students.
sentences.chinese: 我院学生荣获天津市高职高专实用英语口语大赛奖杯。

sentences.english: There is a common culture backing of the advanced education in the Hunan Hubei Chongping Sichan Guizhou Border region.
sentences.chinese: 湘鄂渝川黔边区高职高专教育有着共同的文化背景。
